name: Desert Dhab
description:
You’ve been swallowed by the Desert Dhab - a mythical Arabian monster known as the ‘Godzilla of the Desert.’ In order to escape, you must survive the climb up the beast’s digestive track, and recruit at least three party members to help you unclench its jaws.

Time is of the essence, and unfortunately your new companions are not as helpful as would be ideal. You’ll struggle to maintain control of the situation as their personalities and quirks constantly clash - putting themselves (and you) at risk of painful death by digestion.

Desert Dhab is a darkly comedic and unconventional work of interactive fiction. The party members you’re forced to recruit for survival are constantly fighting you for control of the narrative. You’ll need to keep your nerves in check if you hope to escape the gut of the Dhab alive.
